name: Fatum (download.jpg, BeeWitchtt, gabeq, Staintocton, Jberk, kakoon)
name_original: Fatum (download.jpg, BeeWitchtt, gabeq, Staintocton, Jberk, kakoon)
description:
Note: There are audio delay problems on the web version, download for a smoother experience!

The answers may be written in the stars, but some can read them better than others! Fatum is a tarot-card based simulator where you answer the questions, concerns and cosmic woes of the rich, poor, despondent and desperate for answers. Will you be able to manage their expectations and the needs of the gods?

Made by:

BeeWitcht - Art

Kakoon - Art

Staintocton - Audio

Brody Foster- Code

Voltage - Code

Jberk - Writing

 created for the 2022 GMTK Game Jam
